Small Tabs Styleguide

Small Tabs Styleguide â€º component:

Finder

The specials finder is the main user interface for finding specials by day of the week, neighborhood and bar type. The day of the week value is required and defaults to "today".

Thrifty & Thirsty in Chicago?

Use Small Tabs to find a great night out without spending a fortune!

<div class="finder">
  <div class="finder__image">
    <div class="container">
      <div class="l-1up">
        <h1 class="finder__heading">Thrifty & Thirsty in Chicago?</h1>
        <h2 class="finder__subheading">Use Small Tabs to find a great night out without spending a fortune!</h2>

        <form>
          <p>
          <label class="finder__label element-invisible" for="select">Browse</label>
          <select id="finder__dotw">
            <option>Monday</option>
            <option>Tuesday</option>
            <option>Wednesday</option>
            <option>Thursday</option>
            <option>Friday</option>
            <option>Saturday</option>
            <option>Sunday</option>
          </select>

          <label class="finder__label" for="select">specials in</label>
          <select id="finder__neighborhood">
            <option>any neighborhood</option>
            <option>Albany Park</option>
